meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'forme'.
meanings.sent1: I have two formes in my hand.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to write the formes of the words on the board.
meanings.sent3: The formes of the puzzle pieces were scattered all over the table.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts took on different formes as she pondered the problem.
meanings.sent5: The colorful formes of the flowers brightened up the garden.

meanings.definition: A printing term referring to the individual pieces of type used in a printing press.
meanings.sent1: The printer carefully arranged the formes for the next print job.
meanings.sent2: The formes needed to be cleaned before starting a new project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous apprentice mixed up the formes as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The formes clicked into place like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The formes clattered as they were rearranged on the press.
